last_episode_to_air.name: Tattle Tale Terror & Army Brat
last_episode_to_air.overview: When their parents disapprove of a teenage couple, the outcome is homicidal leaving a family in tatters; a lonely, young girl is befriended by a group of disaffected teens.

name: Killer Kids
overview: Killer Kids provides an in-depth profile of the lives of kids who kill. What can possibly motivate kids to commit criminal acts and even murder? From hate crimes to gang initiations, murders of family members to occult ceremonies, each case in the series exposes different motives and methods of murders by children.

episodes.name: Occult Killers
episodes.overview: In Canada, a 7 year old boy is murdered and partially eaten by a 14-year old. Elyse Pahler, a fifteen-year-old California girl who snuck out of her parent’s home to meet three male acquaintances from school. The boys-teenagers who had a heavy metal band-killed Elyse as a sacrifice to Lucifer so their band would take off.

episodes.name: Psychopath Killers
episodes.overview: Canadian serial killer Peter Woodcock, a teenager who murdered three young children in 1956 and 1957. Woodcock was placed in psychiatric care. While institutionalized, he murdered a fellow psychiatric patient in 1991.

episodes.name: Sexual Killers
episodes.overview: Young sex offenders who kill.

episodes.name: Hate Killers
episodes.overview: Sophie Lancaster was a twenty-year-old English woman who was beaten to death in 2007 for dressing in the Goth style. Sophie and her boyfriend, Rob, were attacked while out walking together. One of the responding emergency professionals was unable to tell whether the victims were male or female due to the extent of their injuries.

episodes.name: Family Killers
episodes.overview: On April 23, 2006, Canadian police find the bodies of the Richardson family; a young teen convinces her boyfriend to murder her overly strict grandmother; in France, Pierre Folliot murders his parents and his brother but his sister survives.

episodes.name: School Killers
episodes.overview: Eight days after the Columbine massacre, Canadian Todd Smith opens fire at his high school, killing one student and wounding another. In 1995, French teen Leila Zafar murders her friend in her school restroom after an argument. In 1997, American youth Luke Woodham murders his mother before going to Pearl High School to murder his ex-girlfriend, her friend and wounding 7 others.

episodes.name: Group Killers
episodes.overview: In 1993, two British young friends abducted two-year-old James Bulger, took him to a railway track and brutally murdered him. In Canada, a young boy arranges for his two friends to murder his mother and grandmother while hanging out with a girl to establish an alibi. While running away from their California homes, two teen girls murder an elderly woman for her car.

episodes.name: Baby Killers
episodes.overview: Matthew Reid was a 3-year-old foster child from Canada who had been with the same foster family since the age of 10-months. The family took in an additional foster child about whom they knew little. This new girl, a young teenager, suffocated Matthew on her first night in the home. The girl was found to have mental disabilities. Though she was known to have violent tendencies, the new foster parents were not told of the problems.

episodes.name: Foul Ball & Framed
episodes.overview: An 8-year-old vanishes without a trace, a neighbor with a suspicious past is targeted, but no one is prepared for what's revealed; A hard-working teen with a bright future is set up and slaughtered to death by the friends he least expects.

episodes.name: Redemption & Salt in the Wounds
episodes.overview: An adopted son develops violent tendencies. Two teenage siblings commit murders in a Nevada trailer park.

episodes.name: Spoiled Rotten & Bad Dreams
episodes.overview: Family members are shot to death in their sleep and a teen is suspected in her friend's murder.

episodes.name: Thrill Kill & Poisoned
episodes.overview: When a young girl mysteriously goes missing, the perpetrator turns out to be a 15-year-old killer acting on impulse; a teenager poisons her grandmother for no apparent reason.

episodes.name: Sibling Rivalry & The Warwick Slasher
episodes.overview: After Ronald Salazar's parents leave him in El Salvador for twelve years, he finally re-joins them in Florida and meets his three siblings. But the reunion goes horribly wrong when culture shock and sibling rivalry turns Ronald into a stone cold killer. When four murders take place in the same neighborhood, police suspect a serial killer is on the loose. What they don't suspect is that they are chasing after the youngest serial killer in U.S history.

episodes.name: A Scream & Banana Split
episodes.overview: Two cousins, 16-year-old Mario Padilla and 14-year-old cousin, Samuel Ramirez obsessed with the movie Scream, plan a killing spree. 13-year-old bullying victim Eric Smith gets revenge on an innocent four-year-old boy.

episodes.name: The Lost Boy & Family Heirloom
episodes.overview: Raised in a polygamous cult, a 16-year-old boy is cast out and forced to fend for himself. When this hardworking teen turns to drugs all hell breaks loose in West Jordan, Utah. To the outside world, the Crains seem to be a model family. But there's a darkness lurking alongside a family heirloom that shatters their lives with deadly force.

episodes.name: The Runner & Natural Born Killers
episodes.overview: A teenage boy from rural Indiana commits a double homicide claiming a demon told him to do it. Together, with two other prisoners he plans a jailbreak to reclaim his freedom and kill again. After the death of her mother, Monica Diaz begins an intense relationship with a boy who is obsessed with becoming a serial killer. The family's threats to break the two teenagers apart results in one of the worst massacres in the history of Los Angeles.

episodes.name: Like Father, Like Son & Back for Seconds
episodes.overview: An abusive father becomes a casualty of his own hate at the hands of his young son; a serial killer stalks a small town and the local police set a risky trap using one of his surviving victims as bait.

episodes.name: Mommie Dearest & Forbidden Love
episodes.overview: A mother manipulates her daughter into a murder plot; two goth teens become involved in a love affair filled with sex, drugs and murder.

episodes.name: Frenemies & the Reject
episodes.overview: A violent ex-con's jealousy leads to a massacre; a boy shows early signs of being a psychopath.

episodes.name: Allentown Massacre & the Copycat
episodes.overview: The case of two neo-Nazi brothers who murdered their parents and brother in Allentown, Pa.

episodes.name: For Sandy & Poison Pal
episodes.overview: Two girls in love conspire to commit murder after they are bullied and shunned; two teens fall in love with the same girl and it changes all three of their lives.

episodes.name: The Million Dollar Plan & Rattlesnake Romeo
episodes.overview: A teen is coerced into participating in a deadly criminal plan; three teens become involved in petty theft and murder.

episodes.name: Simon Says & For No Good Reason
episodes.overview: An outcast joins a military-style cult of misfit teens who are brainwashed into committing crimes; two high-school football players share a fantasy of carrying out an armed robbery.

episodes.name: Peeping Theodore & the Six
episodes.overview: A girl's 1961 disappearance is examined. Also: teens obsessed with vampires, devil worship and drugs.

episodes.name: Two Strikes & Hail Mary
episodes.overview: Teens inspired by "The Godfather" form their own organized crime group. Also: youth sports turn ugly when a bullied kid fights back.

episodes.name: I'm So Lonesome I Could Kill & the Bicycle Thief
episodes.overview: An abandoned boy turns to violence; a mother finds a disturbing message on social media that leads to a murder investigation.

episodes.name: No Apparent Motive
episodes.overview: The 1997 murder of a family in Washington state; the 1991 disappearance of two kids in Virginia.

episodes.name: Please Kill for Me
episodes.overview: A Texas girl convinces two friends to commit a crime; a girl gets her boyfriend to solve her issues with her mother for good.

episodes.name: Satan's Disciples
episodes.overview: Two runaways find themselves on opposite ends of a Satanic ritual; a killer claims the devil made him murder his parents.

episodes.name: Jealousy
episodes.overview: The relationship between a school girl and her new friend spirals out of control when a rival takes offense; a teen obsessed with his ex-girlfriend is unable to contain his jealous rage.

episodes.name: Ticking Time Bomb
episodes.overview: A case involving bullying in a small Illinois town; a hunt for a serial killer in Rhode Island.

episodes.name: The Breaking Point
episodes.overview: A family's 2004 murder in Roswell, N.M., is the focus.

episodes.name: Raging Hormones
episodes.overview: A teen boy gets involved in a dangerous online relationship; a very real monster terrorizes Amarillo, Texas, on Halloween night 1979.

episodes.name: Dangerously in Love
episodes.overview: Teenagers, who because of hormones and development within the brain, cannot deal with intense, raw emotions.

episodes.name: All In The Family
episodes.overview: Stories of children killing a family member.

episodes.name: Out of Control
episodes.overview: A 1991 robbery of an auto parts store goes awry; a thief kidnaps a cashier at a convenience store.

episodes.name: Deadly Compulsion
episodes.overview: A deadly shooting carried out by a teen at a San Diego elementary school.

episodes.name: Cults and Gangs
episodes.overview: A look at antisocial adolescents who found unity in gangs or criminal cults only for tragedy to strike.

episodes.name: Prescription For Murder
episodes.overview: The body of an elderly woman is found spray-painted in red; a boy kills his grandparents after he was prescribed a medication for anxiety.

episodes.name: Stand Out & It Runs in the Family
episodes.overview: A hometown hero is connected to the murder of a Montana business owner. John Olson is shot in the same town a day later.

episodes.name: Knight in Shining Armor & Are You Trying to Seduce Me?
episodes.overview: Danielle Black murders her father in Hagerstown, Maryland. The husband of a woman having an affair with a teen is found shot dead in the doorway of his home.

episodes.name: Crazy Love & Double Vision
episodes.overview: Infidelity derails the promising careers of Naval and Air Force Academy cadets, Diane Zamora and David Graham. Twins Tasmiyah and Jasmiyah lose their single mother, Nikki Whitehead, in a brutal home invasion.

episodes.name: Assassin & The Matrix Kid
episodes.overview: A young married couple is found murdered execution-style inside of their new home; a teenage boy descends into a state of mental confusion as his obsession with a violent movie character causes his world to blend fiction and reality.

episodes.name: Southern Belle From Hell & My Best Friend's Girl
episodes.overview: The brutalized body of a female student is found on the University of Tennessee campus. Then, a young man disappears in Texas.

episodes.name: Pop and Circumstance & Shell Shocked
episodes.overview: Police discover six people murdered in two adjacent farmhouses on a 450-acre dairy farm. Then, firemen respond to an abandoned building on fire and find the burnt corpse of a 9-year-old neighbourhood girl inside.

episodes.name: Good vs. Evil & The Good Son
episodes.overview: When a 16-year-old boy goes missing, suspicion falls upon the boy's girlfriend. A young couple adopts two newborn babies, but before long their boy begins exhibiting disturbing signs.

episodes.name: Vampire & the Essay
episodes.overview: A Florida girl crosses paths with a group of New Orleans misfits and their vampire leader. The son of a hippie chooses murder over peace and love.

episodes.name: Full Metal Jacket & Mommy Issues
episodes.overview: Four members of a family are found shot to death in Montvale, N.J.; police investigating a car accident uncover a twisted tale of teenage love and abuse that leads to the scene of a double homicide hundreds of miles away.

episodes.name: Ready, Set, Action & What Happens in Vegas
episodes.overview: A girl falls victim to two high-school classmates, who film what they believe is their murderous path toward immortality; when a teen tries to break away from a group of aspiring mobsters, he becomes their first victim.

episodes.name: The One Percent and Why Not?
episodes.overview: After being released on bail into his parents' custody, a 17-year-old lashes out against his own siblings; a 17-year-old's parents try to straighten out their son when his drug use spirals out of control.

episodes.name: Rumors and The To Do List
episodes.overview: A teenager with schizophrenia decides that it is his mission to kill everyone in the world; a cheerleader is killed in Orinda, Calif.

episodes.name: Tattle Tale Terror & Army Brat
episodes.overview: When their parents disapprove of a teenage couple, the outcome is homicidal leaving a family in tatters; a lonely, young girl is befriended by a group of disaffected teens.
